title: O - The Fool
subtitle: "Where your journey begins"
description:
Teleports the player to the first room of the current floor.
There is a guaranteed Fool card in the Depths 2, if you bomb the skull with an X on it. This is intended give you a guaranteed way to teleport out of the Mom's Foot fight, for accessing the path to the Mausoleum floor

title: I - The Magician
subtitle: "May you never miss your goal"
description: For the current room, tears now have the Spoon Bender effect, which allows them to curve towards enemies and gives them a purple appearance.

title: II - The High Priestess
subtitle: "Mother is watching you"
description:
Summons Mom's foot which will stomp on a random enemy in the current room, dealing 300 damage.
If no enemies are in the current room, the foot will target Isaac (and do damage if it hits), however it can be used to break rocks

title: III - The Empress
subtitle: "May your rage bring power"
description: Gives the player the Whore of Babylon effect for the current room, increasing damage and speed

title: IV - The Emperor
subtitle: "Challenge me!"
description: Teleports the player to the Boss room on the current floor

title: V - The Hierophant
subtitle: "Two prayers for the lost"
description: Spawns 2 Soul hearts on the floor

title: VI - The Lovers
subtitle: "May you prosper and be in good health"
description:
Spawns 2 red hearts on the floor.
If used in a Super Secret Room containing a Black Heart or Eternal Heart, it will spawn those types of hearts instead

title: VII - The Chariot
subtitle: "May nothing stand before you"
description: Grants the same effect as 'My Little Unicorn', which makes Isaac invincible and deal 40 contact damage to enemies per hit

title: VIII - Justice
subtitle: "May your future become balanced"
description: Spawns 1 bomb, 1 key, 1 coin, 1 heart, which can be random variants of each

title: IX - The Hermit
subtitle: "May you see what life has to offer"
description:
Teleports the player to the Shop.
On or below the Womb, this acts as a random teleport, since there are no shops on those floors

title: X - Wheel of Fortune
subtitle: "Spin the wheel of destiny"
description: Spawns a Slot Machine or a Fortune Machine

title: XI - Strength
subtitle: "May your power bring rage"
description:
Gives the player the Magic Mushroom effect, which increasing size and all stats by 1 for the current room.
If you use the Strength card with 12 heart containers, it will take you down to 11 when you leave the room

title: XII - The Hanged Man
subtitle: "May you find enlightenment"
description:
Gives the player the flying effect for the current room, allowing the player to fly over obstacles in the room.
This card is useless if you have any item which allows you to permanently fly

title: XIII - Death
subtitle: "Lay waste to all that oppose you"
description: Deals 40 damage to all enemies in the room in a similar style to the Necronomicon

title: XIV - Temperance
subtitle: "May you be pure in heart"
description: Spawns a Blood Donation Machine

title: XV - The Devil
subtitle: "Revel in the power of your darkness"
description: Gives the Book of Belial effect for the current room, increasing damage

title: XVI - The Tower
subtitle: "Destruction brings creation"
description:
Spawns some troll bombs at random locations in the current room.
Each bomb deals 60 damage (normal bomb damage

title: XVII - The Stars
subtitle: "May you find what you desire"
description:
Teleports the player to the Item Room.
On or below the Womb, this acts as a random teleport, since there are no item rooms on those floors

title: XVIII - The Moon
subtitle: "May you find all you have lost"
description: Teleports the player to the Secret Room

title: XIX - The Sun
subtitle: "May the light heal and enlighten you"
description: A card with three uses: A full heal, deals 100 damage to all enemies in the current room and reveals the entire map for the current floor (Treasure Map + The Compass)

title: XX - Judgement
subtitle: "Judge lest ye be judged"
description:
Spawns a beggar.
Has a chance to be a demon beggar.
Killing a Devil Beggar, Key Master, or Shell Game Beggar gives you an increased chance of finding Angel rooms instead of Devil rooms. See the dedicated Devil room page for more details

title: XXI - The World
subtitle: "Open your eyes and see"
description:
Reveals the entire map and shows the icons for every room which has one.
This is completely useless if you currently have both the Treasure Map and The Compass

title: 2 of Clubs
subtitle: "Item multiplier"
description:
Doubles the number of Bombs you have.
If you have no bombs, it gives you two

title: 2 of Diamonds
subtitle: "Item multiplier"
description:
Doubles the number of coins you have.
If you have no coins, it gives you two

title: 2 of Spades
subtitle: "Item multiplier"
description:
Doubles the number of keys you have.
If you have no keys, it gives you two

title: 2 of Hearts
subtitle: "Item multiplier"
description:
Doubles your current red hearts up to full health.
This card is useless for the Blu–µ Baby

title: Ace of Clubs
subtitle: "Convert all"
unlock: Unlock this item by getting a 3 win streak
description: When used, turns all pickups, chests and non-boss enemies in the room into Bombs

title: Ace of Diamonds
subtitle: "Convert all"
unlock: Unlock this item by defeating The Lamb in under 20 minutes
description: When used, turns all pickups, chests and non-boss enemies in the room into Coins

title: Ace of Spades
subtitle: "Convert all"
unlock: Unlock this item by defeating The Lamb without taking hearts, coins and bombs
description: When used, turns all pickups, chests and non-boss enemies in the room into Keys

title: Ace of Hearts
subtitle: "Convert all"
unlock: Unlock this item by defeating any floor after Basement I with only half a heart of health (works as The Lost)
description: When used, turns all pickups, chests and non-boss enemies in the room into Hearts

title: The Joker
description: Teleports you to the Devil Deal Room on the current floor

title: Rune of Hagalaz
subtitle: "Destruction"
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #1 (Pitch Black)
description:
When used, this rune will destroy all breakable objects in the current room, such as poop, rocks, secret room entrances.
This includes Key Blocks

title: Rune of Jera
subtitle: "Abundance"
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #2 (High Brow)
description:
When used this rune will double all pickups on the floor in the room.
Creates copies of pickups in the Shop which can be taken for free, even if you haven't purchased them yet.
Can be used to double the number of item chests in the first room of the final Chest / Dark Room floors.
Cloned chests have the same types of items as the first one.
Cannot be used to clone trinkets or other Jera runes

title: Rune of Ehwaz
subtitle: "Passage"
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #3 (Head Trauma)
description:
Creates a trapdoor on the floor.
Digging in certain spots with objects or markings on the floor will guarantee a crawlspace once per floor

title: Rune of Dagaz
subtitle: "Purity"
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #4 (Darkness Falls)
description:
Removes the curse which is in effect on the current floor (except Curse of the Labyrinth).
Can also cure the effect of the Amnesia pill.
+1 Soul Heart

title: Rune of Ansuz
subtitle: "Vision"
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #5 (The Tank)
description: When used, reveals the entire map including all the secret room locations and other icon rooms

title: Rune of Perthro
subtitle: "Change"
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #6 (Solar System)
description: Rerolls all pedestal items in the current room (One time use of the D6)

title: Rune of Berkano
subtitle: "Companionship"
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #20 (Purist)
description: Summons 3 blue friendly spiders and 3 blue flies

title: Rune of Algiz
subtitle: "Resistance"
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #8 (Cat Got Your Tongue)
description: When used, gives you an invincibility effect which lasts for 20 seconds

title: Blank Rune
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #30 (Guardian)
description:
When used, gives a random Mystic rune effect.
Possible effects include: Algiz, Ansuz, Berkano, Dagaz, Ehwaz, Hagalaz, Jera, Perthro.
Also has a 25% chance to spawn another Blank Rune upon use

title: Black Rune
subtitle: "Void"
unlock: Unlock this item by beating Greedier mode as Apollyon
description:
When used, this rune deals 40 damage to all enemies in the room and consumes all pedestal items in the room, giving you a random stat increase for each item consumed.
Also consumes all pickups in the room and turns them into blue flies and spiders

title: Chaos Card
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #9 (Demo Man)
description:
A card which can be thrown as a projectile directly infront of Isaac, instantly killing anything it hits, including most bosses.
If thrown at a multi-phase boss with multiple forms such Satan, Mega Satan or Hush it will only kill that particular phase of the boss.
If thrown at a multi-phase boss that works from a single health bar such as Isaac, ??? or The Lamb, it will die instantly.
Will not kill Delirium or The Beast.
Will destroy rocks and poop in its path.
Can also be thrown against a door to open it (Doesn't work against Mega Satan's door).
Throwing this at the Great Gideon boss will trigger a special animation and reveal a crawl space containing several chests and items!

title: Credit Card
subtitle: "Charge it!"
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #10 (Cursed!)
description:
When used, removes the price tag from all items in the current shop or devil deal, making everything free.
The effect of the Credit Card only lasts for the current room

title: Rules Card
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #11 (Glass Cannon)
description:
Displays a random cryptic message on the screen similar to the fortune machine ones. One of the following messages may show:.
'Rooms may yield more than you expect'.
'Some doors require a blessing. Carry them with you'.
'The walls will harden over time. Time is the essence'.
'Sleeping gatekeepers will need to be awoken with a loud sound'.
'A piece of paper is your guide'.
'Deny his gifts to attain your reward'.
'A dark market lies under your feet.
'Chub dislikes smoke!'

title: Card Against Humanity
subtitle: "Something stinks..."
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #12 (When Life Gives You Lemons)
description: When used, fills the entire room with poop!

title: Suicide King
subtitle: "A true ending?"
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #7 (Suicide King)
description:
When used, instantly kills you and spawns 10 pickup on the floor.
Each of the 10 things spawned can be any type of consumable or sometimes a pedestal item (up to a maximum of 3 pedestal items).
Any pedestal item created by Suicide King will be related to the room where it was used, meaning that using it in the Angel room will spawn Angel room items

title: Get Out Of Jail Free Card
subtitle: "Open sesame"
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #22 (Speed)
description: When used, will open all doors in the current room, similar to a one-time use of Dad's Key

title: ? Card
subtitle: "Double active"
description: When used this card will activate a use of your spacebar item for free

title: Dice Shard
description: Gives a one-time use of the D6 and D20 effects at the same time

title: Emergency Contact
subtitle: "Help from above"
description: When used will cause two of Mom's Hand to come down and grab a random enemy

title: Holy Card
subtitle: "You feel protected"
unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor with The Lost
description:
Grants the Holy Mantle effect for, which will negate your next hit of damage.
The effect persist between rooms/floors.
Tainted Lost starts with this card, and while playing as this character all cards and runes have a 10% chance to turn into a Holy Card

title: Huge Growth
subtitle: "Become immense!"
unlock: Unlock this item by getting 5 items or consumables that increase your size, e.g. 'One Makes you Larger' pills, Magic Mushroom etc
description:
Temporarily makes Isaac huge, giving him +7 Damage Up and +30 Range Up for the rest of the current room.
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Coper140

title: Ancient Recall
subtitle: "Draw 3 cards"
description:
Spawns 3 random cards on the floor when used.
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Coper140

title: Era Walk
subtitle: "Savor the moment"
unlock: Unlock this item by getting both the Broken Watch and the Stop Watch in your collection
description:
When used, this card will slow down enemies, Isaac's tears by -1 Shot Speed, but speed up Isaac's movement speed by +0.50 for the rest of the current room.
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Coper140

title: Rune Shard
subtitle: "It still glows faintly"
description:
Activates a random rune effect. The effect is weaker than normal runes..
These only appear if not all runes have been unlocked yet.

title: O - The Fool?
subtitle: "Let go and move on"
unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Lost
description:
When used, this card drops all of your hearts (including non-red hearts), coins, keys and bombs on the floor.
This effect is done in the most efficient way possible - e.g. if you have 99 coins it will create 3 x Quarters, 2 Dimes and 4 Pennies. If you have 40 bombs it will spawn 4 x Boom! pedestal items.
Picking up all dropped items leaves you with the same health and consumables you had before.
This allows you to manipulate your consumables in lots of different ways, for example by rerolling them with the D6/D20, re-arrange your Bone heart containers and more.
If you have the Tarot Cloth item, this card will also drop all your passive items on the floor as pedestals

title: I - The Magician?
subtitle: "May no harm come to you"
unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Judas
description:
Gives you a blue aura that repels enemy projectiles, causing them to slowly curve away from Isaac and avoid hitting him.
Lasts for 60 seconds

title: II - The High Priestess?
subtitle: "Run"
unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Lilith
description: Causes Mom's Foot to keep stomping down randomly for 60 seconds where Isaac is standing

title: III - The Empress?
subtitle: "May your love bring protection"
unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Eve
description: Gives 2 HP Up and +1.5 Tears Up for 60 seconds

title: IV - The Emperor?
subtitle: "May you find a worthy opponent"
unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted ???
description:
Teleports you to an extra boss room, that drops a Boss room item as normal. This room isn't part of the actual floor, and leaving it returns you to where you teleported from.
The boss isn't necessarily from the current floor - e.g. you could find a caves boss in the basement

title: V - The Hierophant?
subtitle: "Two prayers for the forgotten"
unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Bethany
description: Spawns 2 Bone hearts on the floor

title: VI - The Lovers?
subtitle: "May your heart shatter to pieces"
unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Magdalene
description:
Spawns a random pedestal item from the current room's item pool.
In exchange, turns one heart container or 2 soul hearts into a broken heart. Broken hearts permanently subtract from your total possible health containers

title: VII - The Chariot?
subtitle: "May nothing walk past you"
unlock: Unlock this card by defeating challenge #42 (Hot Potato)
description: Isaac turns to stone and can't move for 10 seconds, but your tear rate goes up significantly for the duration

title: VIII - Justice?
subtitle: "May your sins come back to torment you"
unlock: Unlock this card by defeating challenge #43 (Cantripped)
description: Spawns 2-4 locked gold chests

title: IX - The Hermit?
subtitle: "May you see the value of all things in life"
unlock: Unlock this card by defeating challenge #44 (Red Redemption)
description: When used, all items and pickups in the current room are turned into money. Everything is sold for its shop price, e.g. Items for 15c, hearts for 3c, sacks for 7c

title: X - Wheel of Fortune?
subtitle: "Throw the dice of fate"
unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Cain
description:
Activates a random effect from a Dice room.
See the dice icon above for each possible effect

title: XI - Strength?
subtitle: "May you break their resolve"
unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Samson
description: All enemies in the current room are slowed and take double damage

title: XII - The Hanged Man?
subtitle: "May your greed know no bounds"
unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Keeper
description:
You turn into the Keeper, gaining triple shot, -0.1 Speed Down for 30 seconds.
Enemies drop random coins while this effect is active

title: XIII - Death?
subtitle: "May life spring forth from the fallen"
unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Forgotten
description: Activates the Book of the Dead effect, spawning a bone orbital or charmed Bony for each enemy killed in the current room

title: XIV - Temperance?
subtitle: "May your hunger be satiated"
unlock: Unlock this card by defeating challenge #45 (DELETE THIS)
description: When used, this card activates 5 random pill effects one after the other

title: XV - The Devil?
subtitle: "Bask in the light of your mercy"
unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Azazel
description: Activates The Bible effect (granting flight) and gives a Seraphim familiar for 30 seconds

title: XVI - The Tower?
subtitle: "Creation brings destruction"
unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Apollyon
description:
Spawns 6 clusters of rocks and objects that normally appear on this floor.
It won't block any doors that exist.
Rocks have a pretty good chance to become tinted rocks

title: XVII - The Stars?
subtitle: "May your loss bring fortune"
unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Isaac
description:
Removes your oldest item and spawns 2 pedestal items from the current room's pool.
Can remove either passive or active items.
Doesn't remove your character's starting items

title: XVIII - The Moon?
subtitle: "May you remember lost memories"
unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Jacob
description:
Teleports you to the ultra secret room on the floor.
The ultra secret room is a red room containing an item from the angel room item pool. Can only be accessed via the Red Key, Crystal Key or Cracked Key. Using this card will also open a pathway of red rooms back to the regular floor

title: XIX - The Sun?
subtitle: "May the darkness swallow all around you"
unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Jacob
description:
When used, grants +1.5 Damage Up, turns your hearts to Bone hearts and the Spirit of the Night effect (Spectral tears and the ability to fly) for the current floor.
Also gives the Curse of Darkness effect that can't be removed for the current floor

title: XX - Judgement?
subtitle: "May you redeem those found wanting"
unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Lazarus
description: Spawns a Restock machine

title: XXI - The World?
subtitle: "Step into the abyss"
unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Ultra Greedier mode as Tainted Eden
description: Creates a trapdoor to a guaranteed crawl space

title: Cracked Key
unlock: Unlock this card by opening Mom's Box on the Home floor.
description:
This is a one-time use of the Red Key item..
The main purpose of the Cracked Key is to unlock Tainted character in the Home floor without needing to find the Red Key. You can force spawn a cracked key by droping any trinket in a Boss Room or Item room, on any floor on your way down to Depths II. When you take the reverse path back up to Home, the trinket will turn into Cracked Key in the same floor/room you dropped it before.

title: Queen of Hearts
unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Mega Satan as Tainted Magdalene
description: Drops 1-20 full red hearts on the floor

title: Wild Card
subtitle: "Again"
unlock: Unlock this card by defeating Mega Satan as Tainted Eden
description: When used, this copies the effect of the card, pill, rune, soul stone or active item you used most recently

title: Soul of Isaac
subtitle: "Reroll... or not"
unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Isaac
description:
Turns all pedestal items in the current room into rotating items, which cycle between the old item and a random new item every second.
This allows you to effectively reroll items like with The D6, but choose the old item as well if you want.
Tainted Isaac has this effect passively for all items.
If you use more than one in the same room, each pedestal item will cycle through +1 random item.
Items are chosen from the item pool related to the current item

title: Soul of Magdalene
subtitle: "Give me your love!"
unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Magdalene
description: When used, all enemies in the current room drop half a red heart that will disappear after 2 seconds if not picked up

title: Soul of Cain
subtitle: "Opens the unopenable"
unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Cain
description:
When used, this Soul Stone creates Red rooms for every possible exit in the current room.
Red outlines of doors appear where this Soul Stone will create exits for.
See the Red Key item description for more information about these Red rooms behave

title: Soul of Judas
subtitle: "Right behind you"
unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Judas
description: Activates the Dark Arts item effect, which turns Isaac into a ghost for a few seconds. While in this form you can walk over enemies to mark them for death. After a few seconds, he will quickly attack each target, chaining higher damage for each enemy it hits

title: Soul of ???
subtitle: "Chemical warfare"
unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Blue Baby
description:
When used this will cause 8 poison farts that leave a brown creep behind, and then drop 7 Butt Bombs very quickly.
Standing in the creep gives you +1 Damage Up and +1.35 Tears Up

title: Soul of Eve
subtitle: "Your very own murder"
unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Eve
description: For the current room, 14 Dead Birds fly in from off the screen and attack all enemies, dealing low but frequent damage

title: Soul of Samson
subtitle: "Slay a thousand"
unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Samson
description: Isaac gains the Berserk! effect for 10 seconds. This gives Isaac a bone sword and he goes on a killing rampage, gaining +0.4 Speed, +3 Flat Damage Up

title: Soul of Azazel
subtitle: "Demon rage!"
unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Azazel
description:
Activates the Mega Blast item effect, which gives you a giant laser that deals x5 your tear damage per tick to anything in its path and pushing Isaac back by the force.
The effect lasts for 8 seconds but does persist between rooms

title: Soul of Lazarus
subtitle: "Life after death"
unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Lazarus
description:
When used this kills Isaac and revives him with 1/2 a red heart. You get a couple of seconds of invincibility to move away after.
The main benefit of this Soul Stone is that it automatically activates if you die, meaning it is effectively an extra passive life while held

title: Soul of Eden
subtitle: "Embrace chaos"
unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Eden
description: Activates the D6 and D20 effects, rerolling all items and pickups in the room. Unlike the regular D6, rerolled items can pick from any item pool

title: Soul of the Lost
subtitle: "Leave your body behind"
unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Lost
description:
When used, Isaac dies and becomes The Lost for the current room. This gives you his ability to fly, and the Holy Mantle effect. However if you take damage a second time you die like the Lost does.
Same effect as touching a white fire, but only lasts one room

title: Soul of Lilith
subtitle: "Motherhood"
unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Lilith
description: Gives you 1 random permanent familiar

title: Soul of the Keeper
unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Keeper
description: Spawns up to 25 random coins on the floor

title: Soul of Apollyon
subtitle: "Bringer of calamity"
unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Apollyon
description:
Creates 15 random Locusts.
Locusts are variants of blue flies, except they have special effects based on the color.
War (Red) - Explodes when touching the enemy. The actual explosion deals flat 60 damage.
Pestilence (Green) - Poisons the enemy it attacks.
Famine (Brown) - Applies a slowing effect.
Death (Black) - Deals x4 damage instead of x2.
Conquest (White) - Spawns 2-5 at once

title: Soul of the Forgotten
subtitle: "Skeletal protector"
unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Forgotten
description:
Gives you The Forgotten as a temporary familiar, with 2 Bone hearts and his bone weapon. He behaves the same as how Esau works with Jacob, following your exact movements.
Disappears after the current room or if he takes enough damage and dies

title: Soul of Bethany
subtitle: "Friends from beyond"
unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Bethany
description:
Creates 6 wisps, similar to the Book of Virtues effect.
Mosts wisps will be the standard blue ones, but have a chance to have random special properties

title: Soul of Jacob and Esau
subtitle: "Bound by blood"
unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush and Boss Rush as Tainted Jacob
description:
Spawns Esau as a temporary familiar, who copies your exact movements the same as how the Jacob & Esau character works.
Disappears after the current room or if he takes enough damage and dies

title: Gold Bomb
unlock: Unlock this item by beating challenge #23 (Blue Bomber)
description:
Once picked up, you gain unlimited bomb use for the rest of the floor.
Using a 'Bombs are Key' pill with this effect will swap your Gold Bomb for a Gold Key

title: Gold Key
description:
Once picked up, you gain unlimited key use for the rest of the floor.
Using a 'Bombs are Key' pill with this effect will swap your Gold Key for a Gold Bomb

title: Rebirth Pills A - L
description:
48 Hour Energy - Fully recharges your active item and drops 1-2 battery pickups. Can be used with Placebo to generate infinite batteries.
Amnesia - Hides the floor map for the rest of the current floor (same as curse of the lost). Can be negated with Black Candle.
Bad Gas - Isaac farts, poisoning enemies around him.
Bad Trip - Deals damage to yourself.
Balls of Steel - +2 Soul Hearts.
Bombs are key - Switches number of bombs and keys.
Explosive Diarrhea - Spawns five live troll bombs behind Isaac, one per second.
Full Health - Restores all your empty red heart containers.
Health Down - -1 HP. If you have 1 or less heart containers, this pill becomes Health Up.
Health Up - +1 HP.
Hematemesis - Empties all but one red heart container and spawns 1-4 red hearts on the floor. Spawns coins as The Keeper.
I can see forever - Opens secret room and super secret room entrances on the current floor.
I found pills - Changes the appearance of Isaac's face for the current room (Cosmetic change only).
Lemon Party - Spawns a large yellow pool on the floor around you, damaging enemies which walk in it.
Luck Down - Reduces your luck stat by -1.
Luck Up - Increases your luck stat by +1

title: Rebirth Pills P - Z
description:
Paralysis - Prevents you from moving for a short while.
Pheromones - Applies the charm effect to all enemies in the room for a short while.
Puberty - Causes Isaac to grow hair for the rest of the run. Cosmetic change only. In Afterbirth+, taking 3 of this pill gives the Adult transformation.
Pretty Fly - Gives Isaac +1 fly orbital, which blocks enemy projectiles and damages fly-type enemies on touch.
Range Down - Reduces your range stat by -2.
Range Up - Increases your range stat by +2.5.
R U a wizard? - Tears will shoot diagonally for about 60 seconds. Effect persists between rooms while the time period is active.
Speed Down - Reduces your speed stat by -0.12.
Speed Up - Increases your speed stat by +0.15.
Tears Down - Reduces your tears stat by -0.28.
Tears Up - Increases your tears stat by 0.35.
Telepills - Teleports you to a random room when used. Has a small chance to take you to the I AM ERROR room, and a smaller chance to teleport to a Black Market

title: Afterbirth Pills
description:
Addicted - Causes you to take a full heart of damage for all sources for the current room. Unlocked from Challenge #24 - PAY TO PLAY.
Friends till the end - Spawns three friendly blue attack flies.
Infested! - Destroys all poops in the room and spawns a blue attack spider on every destroyed poop.
Infested? - Spawns one blue attack spider for every enemy in the room. If there are no enemies this pill spawns 1-3 blue spiders instead.
One makes you smaller - Reduces Isaac's size and hitbox size.
One makes you larger - Increases Isaac's size, but does not affect the size of his hitbox.
Percs - Causes Isaac to only take half a heart of damage from all sources for the current room (The Wafer effect). Unlocked from Challenge #24 - PAY TO PLAY.
Power Pill - Gives you invulnerability and the ability to damage enemies for a short while (similar to The Gamekid effect).
Re-Lax - Causes Isaac to spawn poops behind him while he walks for a few seconds. Similar to Explosive Diarrhea but with poop.
Retro Vision - Pixelates the screen for a few seconds, obscuring your vision. Happens a total of 3 times over 30 seconds.
??? - Gives the curse of the maze effect for the current floor. Unlocked from Challenge #25 - Have a Heart

title: Afterbirth+ Pills
description:
Feels like I'm walking on sunshine! - Turns Isaac invincible for a few seconds (similar to Unicorn Stump). Unlocked from the 'Sin Collector' achievement (collect every Bestiary entry).
Gulp! - When used will consume your current trinket, destroying it and giving you its effect permanently. Unlocked from the 'Once more with the feeling!' achievement (complete a victory lap, defeating the lamb boss).
Horf! - When used, shoots an Ipecac explosive shot. Unlocked from the 'Dedication' achievement (participate in 31 dailies in a row).
I'm Drowsy... - Slows all enemies for the rest of the current room.
I'm excited!!! - Speeds up all enemies for the rest of the room. The effect triggers again 30 seconds after use and again 60 seconds after use.
Something's wrong... - Spawns a pool of black creep beneath Isaac.
Vurp! - Spawns the last pill you used. Spawns another Vurp! pill if no other pills were used yet. Unlocked from the 'U broke it!' achievement (collect 50 items in a single run).
X-Lax - Spawns a pool of slippery brown creep beneath Isaac

title: Golden Battery
unlock: Unlock this by defeating Mega Satan as Tainted Forgotten
description:
Fully charges your active item when picked up.
Also, you take a full heart of damage when picked up. Doing this will cause this Golden Battery to reappear somewhere else on the floor

title: Golden Troll Bomb
description:
Spawns similar to regular troll bombs and cannot be picked up.
However, they will explode forever instead of disappearing.
The Safety Scissors trinket will turn this into a gold bomb

title: Golden Penny
unlock: Unlock this by defeating Mega Satan as Tainted Keeper
description:
When picked up, will respawn again at a random location in the room.
Every time you pick up a golden penny it has a 5% chance to disappear completely

title: Gold Heart
unlock: Unlock this item by beating challenge #21 (XXXXXXXXL)
description: Once picked up, the gold heart will drop money on the floor the next time Isaac loses a heart

title: Bone Heart
unlock: Unlock this item by unlocking the Forgotten character. See the Broken Shovel / Mom's Shovel items for more information on how to unlock
description: Takes three hits to deplete and can be refilled with red hearts, but disappears forever when depleted

title: Rotten Heart
unlock: Unlock this by entering the Corpse floor for the first time
description:
Rotten Hearts fill up a whole container the same as normal red hearts, or the rightmost heart if you're at full health.
Every time you clear a room, you'll spawn 2 Blue Flies for each Rotten Heart you currently have

title: Black Sack
unlock: Unlock this by defeating Mega Satan as Tainted Judas
description:
Spawns 2-3 pills, black/bone hearts and/or bombs when picked up.
Can spawn in place of a regular sack, including in Shops for 7c.
Only one heart can spawn per sack as a maximum

title: Repentance Pills
description:
Shot Speed Down - -0.15 shot speed.
Shot Speed Up - +0.15 shot speed.
Experimental Pill - Increases one random stat and decreases another random stat. Amount changed equals the equivalent stat up/down pill. If you have PhD it will only increase one stat

title: Gold Pill
unlock: Unlock this by defeating Mega Satan as Tainted Cain
description:
When used gives a random pill effect.
Can be used multiple times, but every time you use it, it has a chance to disappear.
The Gold Pill can spawn as a Horse Pill, which then causes it to give random Horse pill effects

title: Horse Pills
unlock: Unlock this by defeating Mega Satan as Tainted Eve
description:
Horse Pills rarely spawn as larger versions of normal pills with more powerful effects.
Items that synergize with pills also have the same effect with Horse pills.
In general, the effect of a Horse Pill is double the effect of a normal pill i.e. Speed Up will be +0.3 instead of +0.15. Pills with effects that can't necessarily 'double' are stronger, i.e. Pretty Fly gives a Big Fan item rather than a fly orbital

title: Dice Rooms
description:
1 Dot - Rerolls all of your items. (Does not change your trinkets, pills or cards).
2 Dot - Rerolls all pickups in the room. (D20 effect).
3 Dot - Rerolls all pickups on the entire floor.
4 Dot - Rerolls all pedestal items on the floor. (Does not roll your devil deal items).
5 Dot - Reroll and restart the current floor (Forget Me Now effect).
6 Dot - Reroll all of your items and all the pickups on the entire floor (Combined 1 + 3 + 4 rooms)
